ModMetaData.name: Camera Quicksave - Dev Build
ModMetaData.author: the_codewarrior
ModMetaData.description:
Save and load the current camera position, easily creating seamless cuts in your videos.

There is a toggle button in the play settings area to save and load the position.

The position is saved independently for each map and is not saved persistently across reloads. This mod doesn't touch the save file and so should be safe to add to or remove from existing saves.

View the source code on GitHub: https://github.com/thecodewarrior/CameraQuicksave (This is the dev version of Camera Quicksave. The release version of About.xml is available for editing at About/About-Release.xml. Edits made on this file or on the temporary About/About.xml won't show up on the release version. Use VisualStudio to build a "Release" version of this mod when ready to upload your mod!)
